headline: STEEL BOOM! Foundries Announce Record Profits!
description: Capital rewards for selling to the Scrapyard are DOUBLED for 1 round.

headline: INFLATIONARY PANIC! Cost of Goods Skyrockets!
description: The Capital cost of 'Priority Requisition' is increased by 50% for 2 rounds.

headline: MILD RECESSION! Market Cools, Scrap Value Drops.
description: Capital rewards for selling to the Scrapyard are HALVED for 1 round.
